backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user-scoped thumbnail templates with access control, CRUD operations, and helper merge utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high‑level UI and thumbnail‑generation features to their implementing files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten list of concise summaries for all frontend source files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and dark‑theme OKLCH variable definitions configuring global colors and UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing header, generator, templates, features, footer, and toaster components.
Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, loading, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/customize/AISugg: AI suggestion preset UI applying predefined background, style, and title configurations to the editor.
frontend/src/components/customize/Custom: Customization sidebar containing title inputs, style selector, AI suggestions, generation controls, and save dialog.
frontend/src/components/customize/Genera: Action controls for AI generation, randomization, and exporting the thumbnail as PNG.
frontend/src/components/customize/SaveTe: Dialog for saving the current thumbnail editor state as a reusable template, handling authentication and template creation.
frontend/src/components/customize/StyleS: Grid of selectable thumbnail styles that triggers a style change callback when clicked.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with navigation links, branding, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with branding, navigation buttons, and responsive mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/preview/PreviewF: Preview card displaying the rendered thumbnail and a loading overlay during AI generation.
frontend/src/components/preview/Thumbnai: Canvas component that renders a thumbnail using renderThumbnail when editor properties change.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Feature list section showcasing product capabilities with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Generat: Section combining the thumbnail preview and customization panel powered by useThumbnailEditor.
frontend/src/components/sections/Templat: Template management section allowing authenticated users to view, apply, and delete saved templates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and hook providing login, logout, identity persistence, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplates.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, create, and delete templates using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useThumbnailEditor.ts: Manages thumbnail editor state with randomization, AI generation, and serialization helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/lib/thumbnail/backgrounds.t: Exports preset gradient backgrounds and a helper to pick one at random.
frontend/src/lib/thumbnail/exportPng.ts: Renders a thumbnail to an offscreen canvas and downloads it as a PNG file.
frontend/src/lib/thumbnail/renderThumbna: Draws a styled thumbnail onto a canvas, including background, title text, and channel info.
frontend/src/lib/thumbnail/styles.ts: Defines thumbnail style types and configuration presets for rendering text and visuals.
frontend/src/lib/thumbnail/suggestions.t: Provides preset thumbnail suggestions with backgrounds, styles, and sample titles.
frontend/src/lib/thumbnail/titles.ts: Provides lists of AI‑generated and random default titles for thumbnails.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, architecture, known issues, and implemented features for the ThumbnailAI web app. Serves as a versioned manifest describing UI structure, preview behavior, styling options, and simulated AI actions.
